Events that occurred on 28 April.

content.title: On Earth
content.content:
1915 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes You and Me / and the Cottage of Lost Play.
1936 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes the manuscript "Primitive Quendian: Final Consonants".
1948 - Author Terry Pratchett is born.
1956 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Deirdre Levinson.
1961 - Actor Jamieson Price is born.
1965 - Actor Steven Jay Blum is born.
1967 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to John Leyerle.
1972 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a letter to Mrs Robertson.
1979 - One Ring to Bind Them All: Tolkien's Mythology is published.
2001 - Actor Paul Daneman dies.
2008 - Tolkien - min vän Ronald och hans världar is published.
2009 - The 1997 documentary J.R.R. Tolkien is released on DVD in the USA.

content.title: In Arda
content.content:
T.A. 2941:
Bilbo leaves Bag End and starts his journey to the Lonely Mountain with Gandalf and the dwarves.
